title: Poison
description: Everyone dreams of being a princess, well everyone except eighteen-year-old Elena Watkins.After learning about her lost heritage, Elena is forced to choose between learning to be the perfect ruler for Paegeia and her old life.Not to mention that pesky dragon of hers who always seems to appear and disappear at just the right time. With her friends beside her, Elena must discover her own future as Paegeian royalty.Who said being a princess was easy?
author: Adrienne Woods
